Texto: 
abdomen soft, non-tender.
? palpable olive at epigastrium.
surgical - pyloromyotomy.
pyloric muscle hypertrophy > 3mm.
elongated pyloric channel >14 mm.
hypertrophic pyloric stenosis.
hypertrophic pyloric stenosis
pylorospasm.
2 mo old female with over 2 wk history of progressively worsening emesis, now projectile and non-bilious.  patient has recent weight loss.
